--- In samuraihistory@y..., "gilliru" <gillian@g...> wrote:
> 
> 
> Dear everyone,
> 
> My email server collapsed so I've been out of touch for a couple of 
weeks. If 
> any one answered my request for a discussion about Choshu's role in 
the 
> bakumatsu period, I'm sorry for not replying - maybe you could post 
it again.
> 
> In the meantime I have another question: does anyone have 
information or 
> can suggest resources on life in the imperial court in the 
bakumatsu period. 
> I've become fascinated by the seven nobles who were spirited away 
to 
> Choshu after the defeat by Satsuma and Aizu in 1863.
> 
> Many thanks,
> 
> Gillian
